name: leftover
content:
Add to word list

A leftover part of something is the part that has not been used or eaten when the other parts have been: some leftover chicken from last night's meal Synonyms
left
remaining

leftovers [ plural ]
food remaining after a meal: This recipe can serve four easily, and the leftovers are just as good eaten cold.
